title: Covid-19 Is Deadlier for People With Autism, Down Syndrome. Now Families Are Pushing Hard for Vaccines.
author: Alistair MacDonald; Caitlin Ostroff
description: A higher Covid-19 death rate among people with autism, Down syndrome and other intellectual development disorders has sparked a lobbying effort to persuade states to give priority to the group in vaccine rollouts.
cleaned_text: Updated Dec. 23, 2020 1:45 pm ET A higher Covid-19 death rate among people with autism, Down syndrome and other intellectual development disorders has sparked a lobbying effort by family members and caregivers to persuade states to give priority to the group [in vaccine rollouts](https://www.wsj.com/graphics/covid-vaccine-supply-chain-distribution/?mod=article_inline).
